_header: O mortal man by great exaltation
_description: ‘Consilium domini in eternum manet’ — eleven stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar2252.First Lines:
O mortall man by greter exaltaconIn Riches awtoryte & dyngnyte
                    sett…
BLHar2252.Last Lines:
…Consyder the worlde ys all full of care& consyder
                    þat dethe wyll no man spare
BLHar2252.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “‘Consilium domini in eternum manet’ (Harley MS
                2252).” 
             Studia Neophilologica
         26 (1954): 58-64: 61-4.
